page.title: 15Tourism.
page.content: One of the main industries in the area is tourism. Whilst Bangor itself has not got what are known as tourist attractions it still has many visitors during the summer months. The university hostels are rented out to visitors during the summer months. The Menai Strait attracts many yachtsmen and fishermen. There are sailing clubs in the area and these welcome visiting yachtsmen. During the first 2 weeks of August of each year the Menai Strait regatta is held. When restoration work is finished it is hoped that the pier at Bangor, which is 1500 feet long, will help attract many more people. Bangor is used as a base for visiting Snowdon and the mountains of the area which are some 10 miles away.
